channel.title: C# on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in C# on Portfolio

item.title: Bug Invasion
item.description: Bug invasion was part of GitHub Game Off 2021 which is a annual game jam where you get one month to create a game based on one theme. The theme was “Bug” so the first thing I did was to brainstorm ideas. After removing “ant simulation” and “fly tapper” I landed on a game where the bugs in a computer is getting destroyed by the player or “fixed”. I chose the Unity game engine because of my past experience with it.
